title: Obama, Kennedys vacation on Martha's Vineyard - CNNPolitics.com
text:
CNN.com
Obama vacation agenda: Martha's Vineyard's beach time with the Kennedys Updated 1824 GMT (0124 HKT) August 20, 2015 7 photos: Obama's summer vacation 2015 U.S. President Barack Obama plays golf with former President Bill Clinton, left, and former U.S. trade representative Ron Kirk at Farm Neck Golf Club in Oak Bluffs, Massachusetts, on Saturday, August 15. Hide Caption 7 photos: Obama's summer vacation 2015 Obama hands Clinton a golf ball after putting. Hide Caption 7 photos: Obama's summer vacation 2015 Obama and Kirk embrace during their golf outing. Hide Caption 3 of 7 7 photos: Obama's summer vacation 2015 Obama reacts to a putt alongside comedian Larry David as they play golf at Farm Neck Golf Club on Saturday, August 8. Hide Caption 7 photos: Obama's summer vacation 2015 Obama lines up a putt as he plays golf on August 8. Hide Caption 7 photos: Obama's summer vacation 2015 The Obamas greet well-wishers upon arriving at Martha's Vineyard in Massachusetts on Friday, August 7. Hide Caption 6 of 7 7 photos: Obama's summer vacation 2015 President Obama, first lady Michelle Obama and their daughter Sasha walk to Air Force One prior to leaving Andrews Air Force Base in Maryland on August 7. Hide Caption 7 of 7 Washington (CNN) President Barack Obama and his family are spending Thursday at a beach in Martha's Vineyard with friends, including Caroline Kennedy and her family. The First Family has been in Martha's Vineyard since Aug. 7 and are nearing the end of their two-week vacation to the island off the coast of Massachusetts. Kennedy, the U.S. ambassador to Japan, is the daughter of former President John F. Kennedy. The time at the beach with the Kennedys comes days after Obama spent the day with another member of a famous political family: Obama on Saturday teed off with former President Bill Clinton, husband to Democratic presidential frontrunner Hillary Clinton.
